Projects

CheckNet United

Developed a full-stack B2B e-commerce portal enabling retailers to order custom RFID tags. Used Angular and .NET 9 microservices with RabbitMQ, SignalR, and PostgreSQL. Implemented secure JWT authentication and real-time status updates for order imports. Deployed on Azure with Docker containers and DevOps pipelines.

NHS HCD and IFR Systems

Led end-to-end development of Blueteq’s unified NHS funding & clinical platform across 6 modules (IFR, High Cost Drugs, Shared Care). Digitized paper workflows, automated drug approvals, and enabled real-time reporting. Handled £100M+ in annual funding across 130+ Trusts. Reduced admin overheads by 40% and ensured full compliance with NICE/NHS guidelines.
